name: Mentor Graphics Userware Toolbox
short_description:
The Mentor Graphics Userware Toolbox is a collection of application extensions for Mentor Graphics' Electronic Design Automation (EDA) applications. Extensions are coded AMPLE, Tcl, VBScript, JScript, and Visual Basic.
